The claim was published on Facebook on N: 2020, and has been shared more than 1,100 times.
The claim originated from a Thai: language post that suggested Singapore treats anyone older than seven years old as an adult in the criminal court system.
The claim includes photos of Thailand: s pro-democracy protest leaders and their ages, implying that they would be treated as adults in Singapore's court system.
The expert: s verdict concludes that the claim is misleading and provides information about Singapore's justice system, stating that the age of criminal responsibility in Singapore is 10 years old and highlighting the existence of the Children and Young Persons Act (CYPA) that protects and rehabilitates children and youths below 18.
